title: The Royal F***ing Family
itunes:title: The Royal F***ing Family
itunes:subtitle: Why are we still talking about them?
description:
Join us this week as we battle out our opposing views on the Royal Family, their purpose (spoiler alert: it isn’t much), and the most recent drama related to Megan and Harry.


Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
